about.details:
Incorporated in 2003, Mumbai based Dhruv Consultancy Services Limited is engaged in the business of infrastructure consultancy providing design, engineering, procurement, construction and integrated project management services for Highways, Bridges, Tunnels, Architectural, Environmental Engineering, and Ports.

The services of the company include Preparation of DPR and feasibility studies for infrastructure projects, Operations & Maintenance Works, Project Management Consultancy Services, Independent Consultancy, Project Planning, Designing, Estimation, Traffic and Transportation Engineering, Financial Analysis, Technical audits, Structural Audit, Inspection of bridges and Techno-Legal Services.

Dhruv's clientele include Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, National Highways Authority of India, The City and Industrial Development Corporation of Maharashtra Ltd., Jawaharlal Nehru Port Trust, Maharashtra State Road Development Corporation, Mumbai Metropolitan Region Development Authority, Public Works Department, Maharashtra Tourism etc

As on December 31, 2017, the company had over 313 employees on its payroll.

faqs.question: What is the Dhruv Consultancy IPO?
faqs.answer:
Dhruv Consultancy IPO is a SME IPO of 4300000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹23.19 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹54 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on April 27, 2018, and closes on May 2, 2018.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Dhruv Consultancy IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Dhruv Consultancy IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Dhruv Consultancy IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Dhruv Consultancy IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Dhruv Consultancy IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: How to apply for Dhruv Consultancy IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Dhruv Consultancy IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
